AdditionalLinks.Link: Link Two Lives in this Space

Panel.Name: James Prevatte
Panel.Quote: "I really enjoy walking. And I've got all kinds of energy. I've got more spunk now than I had when I was probably 17."

Panel.Name: D'Asia Brown
Panel.Quote: "I've lost 15 pounds and I think that's a really great start. I plan to keep losing weight. That's what I'm trying to accomplish."
